Summary: The name of the guys govind who served us very well.He is the reall server as professional., Good service by Govind and feeling happy for the food and the management. Food was awesome and expect others to come and feel the comforts one thing to add about the cleaness and everything., Gobind Passionate in serving Polite in nature Strict in duty really very nice experience. All food are very nice...., It's my birthday and had a great dinner with my friends here. Thanks 3b

The service was extremely poor and slow . The waiter brought "warm" water bottle on a summer day . When the starters started arriving I was shocked The starters were extremely spicy . Chicken was toooo spicy Crispy corn .

Krishna has taken care of us. And the chef pankaj has served all the special dishes to us. Will go again soon, Visited AB’s 3rd time and as always staff was very friendly and welcoming, decent ambiance and wide variety of food . It’s a must visit for barbecue lovers, Varun and sandeep done excellent job .

Great place  Awesome ambience and food , staff is good and seafood delight is a must try also sizzling chicken  come for budget lunch with your girlfriend , When we first tried, that was 8months back. They started reducing the quantity of the main dish in their Sizzlers . The buffet comes with veg and non-veg sizzler , though without the sides (fries, veggies and noodles/rice). The buffet was decent though not great wrt variety and taste

Service was pathetic. Ordered a sizzler with lamb, was told no lamb . Also, served it with rice instead . When asked for manager, told me he is not here. Prakash was not helpful or apologetic, he just denied that he never served it .

Food taste wise was good. We choose In door A/C seating. Need to work on cleanliness which is lacking in this place., Yet another Sunday evening. It was shocking to see no one in the restaurant though. Ambience was normal and there is nothing to hype about it.. Infact there was an insect in the plate that was given to my first and I had to change my plate eventually .

Ambience an Hospitality are very poor. Food is delicious but you have wait till your patience expires and you finish the food in 5 minutes and have wait for 30 Mins . The tea didn’t taste that good as I had heard. Cups were dirty and the tea was spilled all over the saucer .

The restaurant carved a niche in serving juicy chicken wings with wide spread of 10 to 12 sauces including Texas BBQ, Spicy garlic too yummy and spicy like Original hot and Amazon wild comes in to top of mind . Did ordered bulk wings of 20 pieces and chicken drum sticks tossed with theses sauces were amazing .
The first bite of chicken tasted really bad . I had to throw it after my first three bites . The popcorns were like nuggets but decent . Avoid Salads from them .
Amul had ordered some Choco Chips (5/5) and Alphonso Mango 5/5) ice cream and loved them . I wish Amul can improve their packaging so that icecream reaches intact . The service was also good .

I ordered "all chocolate ice cream" from amul. According to the description there was supposed to be perk and kitkat and hot chocolate fudge in it but there was nothing of it . My suggestion just order basic ice-creams don't go for anything else which is costly . The restaurant doesnt trust me and expects me to go through a hassle .

Located in midst of SLN terminus this place is a sports bar where you can enjoy a chilled beer along with a good match screening . Fish Tikka and crispy corn are good but the food is mediocre . The manager is good who took feedback and there in ensured everything was up to mark .

I ordered Chicken Hakka, they gave us Chicken Chowmein absolutely white, blant and tasteless . I complained to the waiter who said thats the way they make it, yet he offered to replace with Chicken Schezwan noodles which I declined . Today went to this place. I will be brutality true. There's a reason why they are giving huge discounts via different booking/table reservation platforms.

Located on the Khajaguda Road this restaurant claims to be part of the Gachibowli cluster . It has good parking and nice natural setup which has still been maintained despite the recent road construction . I used to visit this place every weekend or in fact twice a week .
I did not like this place at all. This place do not match zomato gold standards . Even if we ignore prices , taste and services are worst that I have encountered in any Zomato Gold restaurant .

Meal box are value for money. The tossed noodles are soft and much healthier than fried and chicken quality is also good . Overall taste is good., Taste was good, though I ordered large the quantity was too little . I ordered extra egg which is no where found .

I would never recommend anyone to ever try out this place . I ordered veg fried rice with gobi manchurian! The taste was good but the hygene was shit! It was for my five year old. Ended up ordering more food , waste of money and time .

We went here during IPL screening. What I really liked about the place is they have round about 42 screens . No fight or waiting to get place near to the screen. Everything was really delicious. Portion were quite good for two .

There is lot of discrimination between zomato gold customers and regular customers . They give lot less quantity for regular customers and also desriminated behaviour . We were not happy with the quality of food served. The variation was good enough . The main course also had 2 veg and non-veg dishes each .

I really had the best food experience in recent times . Starters outstanding.. biryani delicious.. not but not the least chef killed the soup!!!, Went with team for lunch over there...first proper parking is not there...resto is quiet small with very limited options in veg and non vegg...it just avg and dull...I mean neither food is spicy or tasty ... it just just dull...,most people go there for buffet,they served cheap welcome drink,which infected my throat

#Foodengineeringg #RamadanSpecial #Reviewmode Bbbq nation has come up with all new DAWAT -E - RAMADAN where they've bought in few of the best Street foods of Ramadan . The moment I enter I see a Big Raan marinated well on the pan and sizzling hot Mutton Chops searing on ghee! That view Enticed me and I just walked toward it to see that beauty happening .
This is the worst barbeque i have ever seen in my life . Barbeque nation, please don't pay your folks based on our ratings . Feedback is to improve and not to be used as a tool torture .

The biryani thigh, was frozen in the middle! It's a prepackaged frozen food reheated at the time of ordering . The presentation is extremely nice, and the aroma was great . I never received this order 21812387 today. No one contacted me .

One of the worst biryani i ever had. One has to pay for packaging only. Big packaging and less quantity. One should never order from Behroz biryan . Not sure how Behrouz expected us to consume the box full of rice with a small piece of mutton . We have decided not to order anymore from this restaurant .

I strongly recommend this restaurant near Gachibowli, This place is good for any food though the main highlight is the special biryani . Biryani lovers will happily go home tummy full. Also the chicken fried rice is a must try here . Pocket friendly place which delivers food. Quick service. Ordered the Biryani from this place. Loved it.
I ordered paratha and kulchas from here yesterday night and out of 3 ..2 were burnt . Taste was horrible . And when we complained in zomato chat they gave 27 credit points .

The ambience was good, food was quite good . had Saturday lunch , which was cost effective . Good place for a sate brunch. One can also chill with friends and or parents . Waiter Soumen Das was really courteous and helpful .

We ordered corn cheese balls, manchow soup and paneer shashlik sizzler . Paneer was smelling and the waiter was so impolite to even accept the mistake . One bad experience ee had is waiting time even though we booked table prior time . We went for a team lunch, such a worst restaurant .

Bheemavaram pulao was good in meat to rice ration and tasted good . All spices were blended and mixed well, but one thing they used a lot of spices that could disturb the taste . Booking is preferred on Friday's as it gets too crowdy after 1pm .

Recently i ordered paneer tikka biryani which was really bad and i advise you to avoid ordering it . Overall it's a good place to try out different types of veg . I came here once and ordered food 3-4 times . To cut the long chase short, I had purchased 2 items .
Breakfast here is a welcome change and worth the experience . Tried pasta and toffee apple doughnut balanced it out . Loved the sour dough bread, hazelnut latte, french toast, pan cakes etc .

I didn't like the food at all !! We ordered thin crust pizza quatro formagio and it was not thin crust at all with very bland taste on top of that . Then we had the tuna salad which was too bitter to eat . Couldn't even finish it !

The staffs are very courteous and the manager takes personal care for all the guests which adds to the dining experience . The food is amazing, just like the amazing food, chef manoj, madhura and Tanurima are equally amazing. The buffet is versatile, delicious and tempting .

I went for buffet here having lots and lots of expectations, but all waste . Services and hospitality was somewhat good. But when it comes to taste, disappointed. It was completely waste of money . The overall dining experience was average .

Service is good and the people are polite. Quality and quantity both were up to the mark . The Chilli Chicken Dry was One of the best I've tasted,was kinda smoky, chicken was cooked very well, overall a very good subtle starter .

Thread chicken was oily. The captain/manager denied us Axis bank card discount because it was not told before . Seriously it is an overated "Indian Chinese" restaurant . It's a disappointment and below par as per taste .

Food was nothing to write home about - but overall a decent (and pocket-friendly) place for a quick afternoon round of drinks . Music is just awesome and all people do here is hit the floor . Get to know apart from weekend Friday and Saturday rest all the days are ladies night .

Ambience sucks... Worst service... They don't book tables and when I asked a waiter for a table for us, he just ignores and stares away... Well we finally made to a normal table by waiting for others to vacate... I highly recommend not to go to this place . The manager was so cheap n attitude showing ego to the guest .

We were there to celebrate our anniversary . There was a set menu, welcome Drink(very refreshing) tomato Shorba(passable),crispy paneer, chicken tikka (both were very yummy) but the absolute let down was the pan seared fish with tomatoes . The fish was not done properly, no crispy skin and a bit smelly .

We were offered only 2 types of Veg and Non veg starters . The service was poor and slow. I am not sure whether that is for quantity of staff or the quality of staff . None of the staff was nice or responsive in a way that makes you feel good .

The staff was polite and friendly. The quality has been Upto the mark at creamstone from the beginning . The taste of the ice cream was also amazing and so was the ambience but it was a little crowded than expected .

I had Death by Chocolate from here. It was so good. Taste 5/5 Amount 5/5 It will be hard to finish by only one person . Really both ice creams taste was worst. They have added more anjeer rather than other dry fruits.Really I didn't feel like I am eating icecream because of anjeers . People who want ice Cream taste don't go for cream stone dry fruit, nuts overloaded and Afghan ice .price also not reasonable .

Ordered Mix. Veg curry, Roti, Plain Naan & Biryani. Food taste was good but curries are more oily . Price is average. The ambience is sort of ok. The food is good. The staff is courteous enough to address the issue .

Amritsari Nan was bit ok but Chana was worthless. It’s raw and cooked in shahi paneer gravy . I called to the owner of Delhi 39 after receiving order from Zomato delivery boy . Too low quality, the noodles were half cooked, it was tasteless . Shame on a restaurant who has Delhi in its name .

The food is delicious and portions reasonable and reasonably priced Cosy good place to hang out with friends and family, Decent place near to office area in financial district . Ambiance is great you might find prices a bit high but the taste worth’s it . I miss that old cottege cheese steak, enchiladas and lots of great items. Please revert it. I am rating 1 star for new menu, it's tasteless .

Despite having a prior booking ... They made us sit in the last ,where the AC wasn't sufficient . The food was below average and too pricy for the portion and taste they serve. Won't recommend., The service and quantity sucks. The amount of food and the price do not match. Far too less food delivered for the money charged.

Litti chokha lovers missing this delicious dish in Hyderabad can definitely give it a try . They serve litti with 3 variants of chutneys, choka and salad . The vibe here is happening with good music and birthday celebration space .

food was not properly cooked and oil used was of very poor quality . I hate to spend 800 and still be hungry... Total embezzel, extremely pathetic and third class service. no cleanliness. ordere simple noodle, after waiting one hour waiter comes and tell he forgot. will never ever go again and recommend not to go . this place should be closed .

It's very clean and good...the foods are also delicious and the beside glass side place very nice place for couples . Thanks for doc guys I will come again, very nice this place i order to special seafood platter in oyster sauce is perfect tasty special thanks for chefs . Nice ambison great food and good service so staff all so good sezwan noodles very nice and Kung pao chicken also good .

Thai green curry was very disappointing..it was disaster.. The momos was very bad and even the delivery was very late. No one has an answer for the delay. The entire eating experience is ruined. Not visiting the place again, I ordered Hakka chicken .

A classy restaurant in Gachibowli area that serves super awesome Hyderabadi food at a very reasonal price . The waiters are polite and accommodate any special request you have as to how the food has to prepared, It is closed as of 14th May . It is not mentioned on Zomato. Please call before you visit this place. I wanted to take my parents to the place but they referred me to Mustang!!!, The taste was really good in non veg starters, In vegg paneer

I went to the Diners Pavilion, Gachibowli on April 14, 2019 at 8:15 PM to attend the birthday party of my friend's child's birthday . I asked security about valet parking and he said yes there is valet . In fact, that security guy was very unprofessional, and He never told me that there is no valet, so I gave key to park my car .

I ordered a pizza and it was late with a delivery time of 1hour . Once I got the pizza it was smashed . When asked for a refund they said they will give me "Domino's" credits . Also I don't want Domino's credits. I want my money back .

The order arrived in 45 mins, all my food had completely cooled down . I asked the delivery boy about their 30 mins policy, and he agreed to give me a 300 rs refund . People like this don't deserve to be a part of DOMINOS .

Driven is a bike themed cafe where you can even take bikes or luxury cars for rent This is located in the busiest IT areas of Hyderabad . The food is good here but certainly overpriced. It is one of the places that is open till late night .

We went at 6:30 am here because we found that this place is open at this time, but we met with disappointment as there was nothing we could eat or drink . We ordered cold coffee and capacuino . I would give a 4* for its ambience. Received a very small piece of cheese toast. CCD serves better coffees .

I used to love the Boston creme donut. What once used to have a juicy, creamy filling is now a miser's dab . I have eaten at this place a couple of times before and the donuts were decent . So when we tasted them, they felt so stale and tasteless, as if they have been made at least 3 days ago . The staff did apologise but it wasn’t a pleasant experience .

Dunkin Donuts has always been a great donut place according to me . I particularly love the Naughty Lucy burger, which is an all time favourite . The chicken burger tasted fine but, why on earth did the burger have a layer of hash browns?

eat India team will be my best restaurants for Hangout with friends . I would like to start that it worth it..went for dinner buffet,i love the spread of asian and indian dishes which were in the buffet..on top of that excellent service by all the polite staff in the restaurant..we took buffet which was well prepared..overall excellent service and good food,highly recommended and I would surely be back in short time .

The service was so lethargic that I had to wait almost 30 minutes for my food on a day when only 3-4 tables were booked . The only positive side of this place is the ambiance which is great, authentic artifacts from the past add a good aurora .

As part of tasting review, ordered masala paneer wrap, jumbo chicken wrap and sigbature rice roasted chicken, you guys rock, well balanced taste . Overall satisfied with the taste and service. Will visit the store soon. All the best guys.keep going.
My money of Ovenstory pizza order is not refunded . The Egg wrap is made by unprofessionals . I ordered for smoked butter chicken combo under royal indian mean which costs 290 .

We visited this place on our friend's birthday and they surprised us with cute little cakes and birthday wishes . Overall 3/5 Ambience 4/5 Food 3.5/5 Value for money 2/5, I was simply amazed to experience an entirely different level of hospitality and customer delight at this place! The staff ensure that they have a great connect with all the guests and cater to even the tiniest of the guests' requirements .

We visited Sheraton Hyderabad for Sunday Dinner! Awful experience..Food was all cold without any taste..though staff was courteous and tried to compensate by good behaviour but all in vain when food is not good . To start with Service is so bad here, we had to beg for serving drinking water . The quality of food is ok and fish fry was stale. linen napkins on the table are not properly washed or might be used ones .

The menu present is splendid and too many items are there that you won't be able to taste each and every item(I don't even remember all the names) Starters are mouth watering (as I write), may it be veg or non-veg . This section includes sushi, golgappa, aamras shot, etc.
Flechazo Gachibowli deeply lacks a sense of hygiene . The chefs at the live counters very well display the hygiene standards of this place .

Frio is one of my favorite restaurants in the locality. Great food. Good interiors and good service. Some of my favorites are stuffed chicken breast, curry cream risotto with chicken and broccoli and Hyderabad hot pizza . Food is amazing, they have baked pizzas that's really tasty and cool, snackers lip smacking .

The first giveaway was the menu cards. They were all torn and faded . Few of them even had the spiral binding missing in places . Coming to the food, I can say that it was very disappointing . The wings were glazed in two different sauces though they both tasted the same .
GD’s is a place to go to have a gastronomic experience . The polite owner will always be around asking you about the burger and always taking care of anything the bakers want .

Meat in the burger was little uncooked and hard to chew but the time they took to make it was far too long . I ordered parcel instead on three layer cheese, they put only one piece cheese in burger- this happened twice with me... cheating with Customer who order online. I will not order from this restaurant ever again.

Service is quick. Overall a value for money., Food tastes good..We had hara bara kabaab, aachar paneer tikka in starters..Not so great.Patiala lassi is not up to the mark....But service ia very bad...Management should concentrate on service as well..., Cool Interior, Service was bit slow.

The gravies were overtly sweet and tasted nothing like the original dishes . The dal khichdi was tolerable (but not good) Since it's mango season, expect the mango lassi to be made of fresh ingredients .

Chicken Mandi is the best in gachibowli very tasty and worth the money . Delivery on time, The restaurant did not feel hygienic at all . There were house flies all over. The tables were wiped but felt really old and unclean . Staff this is eignor i tollk to not care . I am regular customer Last and fast, Food is good but not up to the mark and decor is not good at all. Not suitable for family .

If wanna eat biryani always order from hitech bawarchi, Need little improvement for biriyanis . For eg. Salt was less whereas it should be proper . I ordered egg soft noodles from here, they didn't even included spoon or spork for the item .
udjjsekjawigsjeisijueusoawjhssslbsksoegjsfak date s have hdaivdbskbduauhsjsjskaksskskhdvdhsvd . We ordered chilli chicken and chicken 65 from Zara hi-fi restaurant .

I ordered chicken masala curry from here but I got Curry chicken with mix of omlate . I had a very bad experience with the last order. I ordered kadai chicken. The pieces were spoiled. The gravy was smelling really bad .

Ordered Paneer maggi and it tasted really good . The quantity of maggi was good but there were only 4-5 tiny pieces of paneer . I ordered an veg corn Maggie which was okay to eat . But the fried maggie's are much more tempting and tasty .

I don't understand why people do this. It's food. Not any product. If you want to increase the price. Do it. But how can you serve this type of food to anyone. This is completely rotten and even smells very bad. Would never order from you again. There were no vegetables in vegetable maggi except cabbage and paid extra for cheese which was stinking. Will not recommend nor order again. Waste of money, Ordered cheese corn maggi and veg cheese maggi for 100 rupees and

Hyderabadi spicy biryani will go for 3 people ...curd rice jus yummy ...nearest place to dlf to go for lunch or dinner . Ordered chicken dum Biryani from this place once but taste is not up to the mark . Everytime I ordered the taste is awesome .

The staff is not polite. Even we got dirty plates. Its one of the worst experience I had . I would suggest to order food from online if you wish to have food from here . The taste of food is decent but it has no ambience .

Quality of the food need to be improved, I do not see anything except cauliflower and beans in biryani . Ordered Paya Shorba. It was too oily. Food made me unwell. Really one of the better places than the Crowd destinations . Tried some items as a-la-carte .

I have ordered Paya shobha soup the worst ever that i have ever eaten . They have added some veg soup and some pieces of mutton do you ever think this is paya soup anfI doubt they have got the order from some other place . I have never tasted it's been like chewing just half cooked meat with no ingredients there is no flavor of eating haleem . My money got wasted and i starved for so long .

Hyperlocal is one of the go to places when you have no plans but wanna go to some place to chill, eat and drink . The food is served in matte black plates which is my favourite part . They have a setup on the balcony from where the view is just amazing .

I wasted my money time and energy. Shame on the management don't even consider the regular customer benfit Please do close it shame on you ppl please don'T visit hyper local any time . If you are playing hollywood atleast play some thing that people hear .

Restaurant: Jonathan's Kitchen - Holiday Inn Express & Suites
Summary: I have been here multiple times . We kept waiting for a waiter and nobody was willing to turn up . The other time we got there at 10 pm, they were trying to get us out . Full marks on food, none on service. Ambience is that of a typical restaurant in a fancy hotel .

Restaurant: Jonathan's Kitchen - Holiday Inn Express & Suites
Summary: Food is fine but their AC is not working and staff says this is out of their control. We were sweating. Didn't expect this from such reputed restaurant . They sent stale stinky paneer tikka which had to be thrown in the dustbin . I have visited Jonathan's kitchen on many occasions .

Good atmosphere to eat with relax.tastes good.quality is good.good serving and serving people.good experience every time when I go KFC . Ordered zinger doubles and hot and crispy chicken...taste was good...packaging was very good( I really liked the KFC sticker on the outside which made me assured food is not tampered with)

I had bad experiences at this place multiple times. The management has no sense of customer experience . The people working there dont even respond to customers properly . I am not planning on visiting this place ever again .

Fast food is Terrible here. They don't know how to make fast foods. Pastries could be considered. The packing and quantity is also too good . The delivery boy was also polite, I had ordered 5 chicken tikka burger from KS bakes .

I ordered Paneer cheese pizza and veg boat from here . Both were pathetic. They don't know how to make pizza. It was smelling bad and taste was really shitty . The sandwich’s wasn’t even proper and thee food was stale . Nobody was there to take my order for 10 mins . Instead of packing two items they packed only one . Loss for me. And there were bones in the chicken meat used in the burger and the pizza bun .
Karachi Biscuits is famous and various imported chocolates . It's a great place to eat and enjoy within budget . You wont come out without buying anything .

I was the second one in the cue but the family whose billing was under process had more than 4 basket filled with items which approx would have more than 40 items . When asked to the manager, to operate other billing counters he replied, "WE DON'T HAVE MONEY TO HIRE"

I have tried Irani Chai and Pasta Sandwich in Karchi cafe and the taste didn't go According to my expectations . This place has a really aesthetic ambiance starting from the vintage design to the 60-70s music that plays in the background . The onion samosa takes me back to my childhood days when we used to buy them at small shops for a rupee or so .

I ordered an Irani Chai and it took them 1hour to serve and it was one first chais ever consumed . The second time, my female friend wanted to use the washroom but it was extremely dirty and smelling . I had to askfor a glass of water 5 times and one waiter passes the message to another and the other one doesn’t care!!!! Horrible service. I m never going back there., Man! The service is so rude, slow and pathetic that you wonder how bad would it
Ambience was good and Ofcourse food too . We ordered some spicy chicken which tastes good . Also ghost biryani which is ok.

Had the worst service of my life. Had to wait for more than 2 hours for the main course . It was later told that there was some problem with the kitchen . They later served food when we were standing outside and waiting for the bill . This could be a one off problem, but I expected better communication from the staff .

Food quality was not as good as expected. We ordered paneer makhan wala. Gravy was too sweet . Please check before going ., Awesome food nd Ambience Must go place if you are staying nearby . Love the live music that happens there on weekends .

Very limited menu for bar and food. Service is below average . In beers only KF avialble. For finger food orders they take more than 30 minutes . The guy says food will be served, but took 1 hr to serve . Not expected, Worst place ever. Came for a party. Arrogant staff. Not even one waiter in a team of 25 people. Music is pathetic. Ambience sucks!

The food is much spicy as u like it most. It's quality and food smells very nice . The AC was non-existent. It felt like we were sitting in a tandoor. The service was pretty slow. The taste was appalling, sub-par service, being in one of the prime locations.

I have ordered king of kodi pulao, Never expect too much from the title of the food . The chicken is undercooked, The rice is giving a weird smell . This is not the adept quality of Kritunga because I have been eating in this cuisine for more than three years. It's getting worse every year .

Food is not good. And people are not polite here. Only appearance is good, This is my third time visiting this place . Good ambience for couples.. Food is absolutely amazing. Staffs are very friendly. Drinks are cheap and good . Do try veg Manchurian as starters it was mind blowing .

I made the payment for a total amount and when I got back home realised that the bar used my Zomato gold coupon but didn't apply to the final billing . Sorry to say it failed here. K, We were 5 friends and I specifically called to ask if stags are allowed . Once we reached, the bouncer refused us entry saying stag is not allowed on dance floor. I called manager again he also denied entry .

This Place doesn't support customization of cakes . Prices are a bit high but they are worth it as the taste is good . Most of the items are made on order, probably 24 hours prior booking is required . I ordered a Triple chocolate cake for my husband .

This place is all about the hype. Ordered their signature cake - Classic Chocolate with hazelnuts . Bad - Extremely dry, hardly any cream inside the layers . For 2900 it's extremely disappointing. An excellent place with mind blowing taste .

I ordered pahadi chicken in starter. It had this taste of spinach and it tasted good with mint chutney otherwise quite bland. But the chicken was cooked properly. I ordered special chicken curry in main course. That was bits of small chicken in rich gravy. It was good not very awesome. I went for Mandi but even buffet was looking nice.

Food was delicious. But the ambience and the service provided were poor . Every order took at least 40mins to be served. Very poor cleanliness. Not sure if I would visit again for a hang out . The place has either bought paid reviews or the management has changed or something similar, because we went looking at all the reviews here and it was horrible . Buffet is a disaster. No fresh food, all the deserts are from previous day .

There are garlic peels in my garlic naan. Not just one but almost everywhere. Staff were least bothered in this concern . I have ordered few times for luch and I liked it. If you have office nearby order food from this place., Good food pocket friendly and healthy .

Very rude staff and bad service. Disapppinted. Decent food. Good harabhara kabab. Have been there multiple times I. Last, never faced such bad service . The bill desk guy apologised on his behalf, but the manager just chose to walk away . Even when i ordered thali, thwy took more than half n hour to bring it .

Ambience of the place is breathtaking and perfect for group , corporate events or a romantic evening . It is so good, that I've been there three times in under a month . The food and desserts were really good .

Reservation was confirmed on the phone multiple times as I was hosting a group of 20 people but we didn't have a table when we reached . I contacted the hotel so not sure how I am supposed to inform ALL employees for a simple reservation . The staff was not apologetic either so we were quite disappointed .

rumali shawarma with/without salad is the best one till date . This is my n-th experience ordering the Shawarma for a quick bite . They are good with quality and taste of the food and I really liked the quick service of this restaurant .

I ordered special chicken shawarma, but there is no cheese & getting rotten smell in it . It has happened several times, Even ZOMATO people unable to help out . I am saying this because when I have ordered here i got a shawarm . The chicken was spoiled and smelling badly, and by having one bite I thrown to garbage bin .
DLF is out there for you . You would find steamed and fried momos, but it's very rare to find them . I am addicted to their chicken Kurkure Momos .
I ordered two veg steamed momos through Zomato and they were lip-smacking good . The red-chilli chutney and mayonnaise were good combination with the kurkure ones .

Food 4/5 Service 5/5 Drinks 5/5 Music 5/5, This place never disappoints me .Food and ambiance are perfect.They have both outdoor and indoor seating with good music .Must try: Chilli prawns, Very cool open roof Restaurant that served great appetizers and booze .

The manager, is the worst manager I have ever met. He doesn’t know how to treat customers. Place is a complete “no no” who prefer good customer service. The people here are not at all polite. I will never be here again. I don't suggest this place at all. You'll be amazed to see that such a famous bar could have such pathetic people.

Best north indian food in town. The flavours were very well seasoned and we were very much satisfied with the reasonable pricing as well . The large menu catering to all needs of group and individual combos .
I strongly recommend to all the city dwellers to stop by through this unique chain . Must try- Makki Di Roti and Sarson da saag .

I ordered noodles and manchurian combo from this place, first of all i would like to suggest management to send fork along with the food as they have only sent the spoons and needless to say you cannot eat noodles from spoon . second the quantity was really less of manurian. some improvement in food is suggested, A really nice place. The ambience was very very good. The views from here are killer. But honestly for me and my friends, their menu was not enough. The place is super good and must recommend for

Food- We ordered Chicken Chatpati Kebab as a starter cost approximately INR 255 . The quantity of Kebab was very less. They served Kebab with the green Pudina Chutney . This was the worst dum biryani I ever had, that I didn't even taste like Biryani . Olive Garden offers 1+1 dish on Zomato Gold membership .

Great atmosphere, met an excellent man - Sarbeshwar. Super cool guy and great service . Food and music is excellent. Basil chicken tikka is a must try . Good food and everything is nice about the place . We ordered mecican pizza , burmese parcel we just loved it .

Food was bad. Ambience was average. No way its rating should be 4.6. Will never go back to this place. The managers are so rude to the customers . Twice they declined the entry on two consecutive days . The behavior of the staff killed the mood .
Paradise is definitly a great restaurant for biryani . Restaurant ambinence is good along with quick service . Always the best - my all time favorite food, biryan ka baap .

I have ordered 2 special chicken biryani's and received two ordinary chicken Biryanis with bones! This is a big time disappointment . The food was especially haleem. People who hate mutton smell but wanted to taste halaem can go try this restaurant .

The chicken biryani is their specialility . Large fragrant rice which are flaky and yet not oily provide a perfect blend with juicy chicken pieces . Smaller pieces would make the Biryani more manageable . This place was recommended by people for some good Haleem .

I have tried biryani from here it was ok. Big name bad service., Attitude problem right from reception/accounts person whoever he is.Burnt food given twice nobdy cares.Take bills shamelessly not even asking why food left as it is without being eaten., If there could be an option of zero stars, I would definitely put it. The food is good, but service is very slow, pathetic and bad .

I would have given a 5 star rating if value for money was a factor in star rating. Waiters were polite , food was delicious. Good place to eat out regularly. went for A-LA-Carte here.. Heard a lot about this previously. went with full of excitement. I wanna rate this restaurant in 3 aspects .
I had bad experience with Masala Papad. I had order 13 masala papad . Food is not great and the service took so long .Food is not totally air-conditioned and the staff is a bit rude to customers .
The place has 2+2 on Zomato Gold, and offers happy hours every day till evening . Would recommend to try the Chicken Nazakath - it lived up to its name with juicy and succulent pieces .

Loud music, average food and untrained staff sum up the place . We ordered a veg hakka noodle which was pathetic and one special pizza which was very average . Most dishes mentioned/recommended in other reviews were not even part of their menu .

It was very crowded. But the ambience is great. The interior design is definitely one of its kind. Good place to party with friends. The security is nice . Given the current trend of clubs in Hyd, I don't find the place expensive . The waiters and bouncers were friendly, even on a busy night with Zaedan performing and took great care .

The reception was quite disappointing. We came at around 7 confirming that stag entry was allowed for a certain fee . Later at 9 we were just denied entry becaue apptetnyl everybody at the reception had quite an attitude and trip of their own .

I placed an order for Special Chicken Biryani. The taste and presentation of food is good . The chicken pieces are so delicious and the rice is so good. I had ordered briyani combo in the midnight and it was extremely spicy and had stomach upset entire day .

Worst chicken biryani ever had in Hyderabad till now No salt ,less chicken pieces No taste nothing Even road side stalls who sell Biryani in 60 rs/- provide 100 times better biryan than this, The food was far more spicy than what was mentioned in the instructions for the restaurant . It was ordered for a person having mouth ulcers and he is on his way to hospital due to restaurant negligence .

I have been to this place with my friends on a Friday evening as they had Bollywood night starting from 8. The food was average. They didn't even had Breezer which is disappointing. The service was not that great. I ordered barbecue chicken but it was not cooked properly but I liked the ambiance and open terrace. Recommend this place to visit once at least.

We ordered spicy grill chicken, we couldn’t differentiate whether it was chicken or some other cheap meat. The fish fingers were oily as Hyderabad’s summer sweat! I would rate 0/5 for this place, If there z an option to give 0 I certainly do that disgusting food ordered multiple option thinking at least this one should be fine but none of the dishes are promising not even close to basic taste avoid this pub nothing means nothing in food .
A good snack joint in Hyderabad. Their dahi papri should top your list., Their gol gappa is a must try. It is different from what we get in Hyderabad .

Ordered aloo tikki which was worst and palak chat which ended up delivering dhahi chat. Everything was very poor in taste. Better to put some effort and visit Bikanerwala in jubilee hills. Maybe all these 4 and 5 star reviews are paid ones.

Haleem, usually found in the Ramdan season, months of march to July served by Shah ghouse and badam kheer are must try, Ordered Chicken Fried rice . Very good; however, didn't give curry with it. Not sure whether they forgot. But did like the way they prepare the food . This time I have experienced Mandi it's very nice quality ManDi lovers will sure love this here with I will request the restaurant add more pics of chicken r mutton,

To my dismay I ordered their renowned haleem last night at about 12PM . Tastewise it seemed average but as I was hungry I finished it fast . I'm pretty sure it was some form of mild food poisoning maybe due to hygiene standards . But if they keep this up they'll gradually lose their clientele .
SG biryani's made me order Chicken Special Rumali Shawarma from Zomato . The delivery, packaging, taste and quantity was perfect . I liked the Libby shawarma more and the Rumali was also good .

I ordered a chicken rumali shawarma from shah ghouse . It was the item with the awful slimy, sickening mayo I had requested not to be added . At olden days it was so good but now they are giving worst Shawarma . The meat wasnt well cooked. The taste was bland .

Kobe's is a really famous chain for Sizzlers., They have a wide range of food offering. Nothing much to talk about ambiance. I visited this place 2 times in a week. 1st time ordered a sizzler which was fantastic. 2nd time we had a chicken stater, soup and a american chopsuey .

I have got my food order replaced every time I have come here . This is my last visit to this place. I am sorry for the negative reviews.. but this time it was unbearable., Service was pathetic and staff was absolutely rude .

Irresponsible Restaurant . I ordered Mushroom masala (not good in taste) and 3 different types of roti's . Delivery of food was good and taste of food is also good . When I tried calling restaurant number , they are not in use .

I ordered food at 7 pm, but the delivery guy gave low quality food without Santosh dhaba logo and even bill was at 06:35 pm... Zomato is looting, Biiyani which you was deliveyed was worst . I kept the biiyan in the dust bin. And also i have order kaju biiiyania, and quantity also verry less and onions and lemons also not given.dont waste your money.

My personal fav foods - - Welcome drink - Pan shots - Starters - Yum banana tikki - Gravys - Malai kofta - Noodles . Mango dal - Chats and Chocolate gulabjamun What is good : - Food is great in contrast to what we generally see in party places where the hall is free - Staff is friendly .

The noodles, starter and the sweet, everything was drenched in heavy oil . The taste itself shows that the oil used is also of low quality . Instead of spending on the packaging of the food, they could have spent some money on providing health food .

The food was bit spicy but manageable and good. Chicken was well cooked and tasty. Quantity was bit less when compared to its price range and it's compitititers . Good Ambience, it is very pleasant in the evening . Away from the traffic and crowd, it’s a great place to organize any events especially in the lawn area .
The hotel is Full cheating we are very much disappointed . It amazes me to see the current rating of the restaurant on Zomato .

Tangdi kebab dint meet the expectations . Bit oily and taste was ok but the mint chutney served with it was delicious . Chicken tikka biriyani was good . Zomato gold is applicable here so it costed only 200 bucks for two .

I ordered tandoori full no quantity no packaging no taste waste of food . Delivery late from restaurant to Zomato delivery boy . Completely worst dinner. the butter Nan the send me is completely worst test and very thick in size and the Nan is not cook in butter .

My friend drank choco brownie its yum to drink its orea n brownie mixture and its around 189rs .They write some note on the sticky notes and stick it to the wall . The ambience is good and enough space for parking too .

Tempteys and MOM rule the shakes world in terms of multiple outlets on Hyderabad . Ambience-(3.5/5) The place is cool, can hangout and can have quality talk . One suggestion is to provide water to the customers, as it seems ridiculous that you deny with the fact that you guys don't have water .

The chocolate excess cake was awesome. It was a completely filled with chocolate ganache. The cake was moist and juicy. The ambience of this place is good. Nice place to hangout with friends., The chocolate brownie and waffles will take you by an awwww! Bad service at this place overshadows the good food .

I was visiting TCR after a long time and ordered a Dark on warm mug, Salad and a Mint Mojito . The Salad had very raw cucumber and it gave me a bad stomach pain . Give plastic fork to substitute real cutlery is way more disappointing than anything in a place as reputed as TCR .

The restaurant is one of the best visited till date in HYD . It has amazing ambience, delicious food and extremely courteous staff . The desserts are also amazing. All in all complete value for money .
Food - 2/5 Service - 3/5 Ambience - 4/5 Kindly do not try the evening buffet as it's very bad., Very slow service, it took us more than 2.5 hours just to have dinner .

I had ordered their Nutella Pancakes and coffee: the packaging was perfect . The coffee hadn’t leaked either. But still manages to be one of the best eggless pancakes joint for me . I have tried 2 rice bowls and 1 shawarma from here .
I ordered a green chicken rice bowl (large) from here . It had less than 10gms of chicken forget about the box size . I don't know what would I have got if I said small portion .

I would rather say best place for romantic couples, good view, ambience of the restaurant, good yummy yummy food and silent music. The manager and people who were serving here are so polite and humble to suggest food and drinks. I would like to visit again soon. The best part is the ambience of it, you cannot ask for a better one in Hyderabad. Other than that, I loved this place and would go there again and again!

The food is decent but the place and service is extremely horrible . Called the manager for this situation and was told that they can't do anything about it . Not worth, Can improve your main course and desserts spread .
Raza, Ritam, Ekrabul. Ambiance and food quality is good . Impressed with service also. No.of items also worth the money . Can visit with the family., Had a great time at Indi grill .
The DJ is awesome and plays best bollywood songs and punjabi too . The veg pizza and pastas are pretty good to try along with fruit punch . I recommend to visit on weekends can get overcrowded .

The Lady Bouncer Aunty didn't allow us to go inside as we were wearing Slides . The bouncers are hostile and say that unless you have a girl, you cannot enter the dance floor . We pay you to get us drunk,not to judge us based on our footwear and whom we tag along .

One of our favourites in the city., One of the best pizzas to try. It served with the fresh crust and the topping of veggies are fresh and the taste of the ingredients was awesome . The tuna sandwich is a win if you like sea food. There are shakes here too .

I placed an order for half kg mocha walnut cake. The order was taken over call and rest of the communication like what message is to be written on cake etc was done on whatsapp . When I called the next day to collect the cake, the message was not written on the cake and they hurriedly packed a cake and gave me . The store management is pathetic and there is no coordination or even an ounce of professionalism in them .

Sonalin Priyadarshini is a very good singer of the City I have ever seen . I enjoyed last Saturday here, Please once again call Singer sonalin to tilt . The ambience, look and feel and the food service is amazing . So, Coming to food, I opted for a Veg buffet .

It's a big mistake if ever u plan to have your food here . We have ordered for Broccoli and left without having our food . Today I went their for a lunch it was a downer We got the empty buffet counters and plates pasta counter closed too early .

The place is really nice and they make amazing cocktails .. Don’t know if they still allow stags . We came at this restaurant for a drink on a weekday at it didn’t disappoint . Music was good. We ordered a Pizza, Garlic Bread and Beers .

I went here with my team, but the staff made sure that we had the worst experience . The food was cold, served very late. Drinks were of bad quality . It happened twice that the staff forgot the order after we placed it. They had to be reminded about the order .

aloo paratha is a very nice option for Paranthas lovers with so many different options . I love that they provide option to customise each combo so that we can select any combination . The Wheat used to make the pranthas did not seem fresh, also the green chutney was stinking .
Zomato refused to help on the issue . I ordered chicken shawarma paratha, which was smelling worst . Money and hunger both went in vain. Never order food from this place .

Food is just like ordinary tiffin centre’s Need to improve and provide food really authentic of Udipi Ambiance is really awkward no cleanliness even in Ac family section also . The sambat idlis, Mysore bondas and vadas are all wonderful .

Rudest billing staff ever. Didn't provide change. Worst customer service. Never going again. Don't know how to treat the customers. Many options available . Never order in this site again, Ordered for tomato bath but they have sent upma .

The so called special 'Raju gari Pulao' was just a nightmare. Don't recommend to anyone, Nice ambiance. Too much expensive for the quantity served. Not worth the money. Most items in the menu aren't available. Taste is just average. Not recommended, One of the best place to serve Andhra delicacies in Hyderabad.

Ambience- 5/5 Food - Being a vegetarian couldn’t find a lot of options . The food was good as usual, but the service is become worse . Not attending tables even after calling them multiple times. It was not even a busy business time . Request the management to have them trained, it just th food which is bringing us here, Ordered Gadwal Kodi Pulav, it had no salt . No resolution on it even after complaining that it was no salt. The quantities

We ordered The Real Bangkok Basa, Chef/Subba’s secret recipe noodles and Sanghai Fried Rice from Urban Asia . Taste was 5/5 Service 4/5, little bit slow in bringing food . The staff is kind and I think that's the moto of the Restaurant .

We visited the Gachibowli location of the restaurant and it is clubbed with East India Co . The waiter handed us the "Signature" menu and that is when the ordeal began . It was surprising since it was a Saturday and I assumed that the restaurant would be well prepared to handle something important as their Signature Menu .

Restaurant: Yum Yum Tree - The Arabian Food Court
Summary: We ordered mutton Haleem and Chicken Fahm Mandi Half for two people . The masala was perfect but people who don’t like masala may not be pleased much. They give good amount of chicken . Taste-5/5, Situated at the heart of the town, this is by far the best place to lay your hands on Arabian and Yemeni dishes in the City of Nawabs .

Restaurant: Yum Yum Tree - The Arabian Food Court
Summary: Hyderabadi Haleem here is very famous so ordered from this restaurant . I haven't tried any other dish here and now I am hesitant to order anything from here . Really pathetic Mandi, Ordered grilled tandoori and to my surprise i have got 2 neck pieces for one chicken . The food quality has gone down compared to its initial opening period .

Zega is a beautiful Pan Asian restaurant located amidst the lavish property of Sheraton Hyderabad . The restaurant has got a great ambiance to it and serves some authentic Pan Asian dishes that one could ask for. The first thing to try out was their Chicken Thukpa .

Staff was appearing to be busy and had no courtesy to attend our table . One of the staff half served a dish (Sushi) which was ordered 90 mins. before it was served . Noisy place..., Late night place. Open till 4am. Food was okayish. Nothing great about the place apart from the fact that it's open late night and serves booze .

The food is toooooooooooooo good. The interior and the ambiance both are very cozy. Only the staffs could have been a little more attentive. The wash basin and toilet should have been as neat and clean as the restaurant . The staff there are just not interested and they act as if they do a favour to you .
Food is not bad but not like northeast. Service are very slow n staff will not respond properly . I asked for northeast food n disappointed .

I had ordered gobi methi paratha for the second time . It was ok. Not good. Not much taste. Not fresh. Food was good but it was all leaking from the plate . Intially, yes,the food was really good they were maintaining quality standard of food very well,which is rare in Indian restaurant nowadays I don't see that happening these .Today I have found hair my fit thali,which shows how much hygienic they are .

Hyderabad's most worst and ugliest biryani i had yesterday from the restaurant Eat fit . It has been 2hr late i have received from the Biryani from Eat Fit . This is a Horrible . i ate in Hyderabad, Order no - 1127326452 Ordered rajma rice and what I received badly smelly rotten food . And Zomato is not even helpful to resolve it .

I had the worst experience ever of going to a place. Extremely disappointed. Please learn how to manage a crowd. Also I wanted to book my table beforehand. But the option was not even available on Zomato and they won't pick up call. It just felt they didn't want things to be systematic.

Place is a mess was shocked to see chaos the other day and i had an upset stomach after having the food from here there was total confusion i will never order from this place again n frank opinion it reminded me of hell sorry but i spoke my mind . The youghurt/curd used to make the lassi was utterly sour . Somehow managed to drink and my stomach was upset with the order .

Food was spoiled and the same was informed to the staff but not even got a response from them . This type of service won't earn anything. This will be my last visit to this restaurant. Extremely rude staff and costing like anything if u see there place .

Service is too bad and ambience is not bad.food is not taste....waste for atleast 1visit We hav ordered chicken and prawns and veg items . Worst thing I got 4 dinner, I ordered Full grill it was not all grilled unable to eat also Full like a flesh the worst grill in my life I hate .
